text.section: A license expires on the first December 31 after its effective date unless it is renewed as provided in this section.

At least 1 month before a license expires, the Commissioner shall mail to the licensee, at the last known address of the licensee:
a renewal application form; and
a notice that states:
the date on which the current license expires;
the date by which the Commissioner must receive the renewal application for the renewal to be issued and mailed before the license expires; and
the amount of the renewal fee.
The Commissioner shall renew the license of each licensee that meets the requirements of this section.
